title: Meet the MSD of finance: Sharechat's Manohar Singh Charan - Forbes India
content: Meet the MSD of finance: Sharechat's Manohar Singh Charan  Forbes India
description: One MSD [Mahendra Singh Dhoni] is from Harmu, Jharkhand, and the other, Sharechat's CFO, is from Harmoo, Rajasthan. Both of them are good at coming off a sticky wicket
